recipe_name: Toasted marshmallows in warm blueberry soup
author: Tony Tobin
method: For the toasted marshmallows, colour the marshmallows all over using a mini-blowtorch until golden-brown. For the soup, place all of the ingredients into a saucepan, bring to the boil and simmer for 8-10 minutes. To serve, pour the soup into a bowl and top with the marshmallows.
ingredients: 8 pink marshmallows,  100ml/3½fl oz red wine,  50g/1½oz caster sugar,  1 bay leaf,  100g/3½oz blueberries,  1 tsp ground mixed spice,  1 tsp ground cinnamon,  1 tsp ground cloves
